name: com.midniteoilsoftware.multiplayer
description: Boilerplate for making multiplayer games in Unity using Netcode for GameObjects, Unity Gaming Services (Lobby, Relay), and authentication. Includes complete Othello sample game demonstrating turn-based multiplayer gameplay.

samples.description: A complete turn-based multiplayer Othello (Reversi) game demonstrating the framework's capabilities including game logic, networking, UI, and Unity Gaming Services integration.
